title: SNFEI Generation Test Vector Set
description: Schema for a file containing a set of end-to-end SNFEI generation test vectors.

$schema.description: The JSON Schema URL this document adheres to.

vectorSetId.description: A unique identifier for this set of test vectors (e.g., snfei-generation-full).

specVersion.description: The version of the specification the vectors are testing.

vectorVersion.description: The version of the test vector set itself.

description.description: A brief description of the purpose of this test vector set.

generatedAt.description: The date the test vector file was generated (YYYY-MM-DD).

hashAlgorithm.description: The hashing algorithm used to produce the SNFEI (e.g., SHA-256).

hashFormat.description: The format of the final hash value (e.g., lowercase hex, 64 characters).

canonicalFormat.description: The pipe-delimited order of fields used to create the canonical string.

vectors.description: An array of individual SNFEI generation test cases.

id.description: Unique identifier for the specific test case.

description.description: A descriptive name for the test case.

input.description: The raw input data used for SNFEI generation.

jurisdiction.description: Optional: used for localization prior to normalization.

intermediate.description: The results of the normalization steps and the canonical string.

after_localization.description: Optional: The name after the localization step, before final normalization.

snfei.description: The expected 64-character lowercase hex SHA-256 hash.

equivalentInputs.description: Optional: A list of equivalent inputs that should produce the same SNFEI.

confidence.description: Optional: Metadata about the confidence of the generated SNFEI.

crossImplementationNotes.description: Notes for implementers on consistent handling of edge cases and formatting.
